price: Ishee keessa zalaalam jiraatoo tahanii (ishee seenu). Rabbiin waadaa dhugaa isaaniif gale. Inni injifataa, ogeessa.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
